description: [{'description': "The 2016 Mazda CX-5 GT AWD is a compact crossover SUV that combines stylish design, athletic performance, and a host of premium features. Exuding a sleek and modern aesthetic, the CX-5 GT showcases Mazda's KODO: Soul of Motion design philosophy, with its sculpted body lines, bold front grille, and distinctive LED headlights that give it a dynamic and sophisticated presence on the road. Under the hood, the CX-5 GT AWD is powered by a 2.5-liter SKYACTIV-G inline-four engine, producing 184 horsepower and 185 lb-ft of torque. This engine is paired with a six-speed automatic transmission, providing smooth and responsive shifts. The all-wheel-drive system enhances traction and stability, making it well-suited for various driving conditions, from city streets to off-road adventures. Inside, the cabin of the CX-5 GT AWD is both luxurious and functional. High-quality materials, including leather-trimmed seats and soft-touch surfaces, create an upscale atmosphere. The front seats are heated and provide excellent support for long journeys, while the driver's seat features power adjustments and lumbar support for added comfort. The rear seats offer ample space for passengers, and the rear cargo area is versatile, with a 40/20/40 split-folding configuration to accommodate different storage needs. The CX-5 GT AWD is equipped with an array of advanced technology and convenience features. The infotainment system includes a 7-inch touchscreen display with Mazda Connect, offering navigation, Bluetooth connectivity, and a premium Bose audio system with nine speakers for an immersive listening experience. Additional features such as dual-zone automatic climate control, a power moonroof, and a rearview camera enhance the driving experience.
